text: Joseph Henry Delaney (25 July 1945 â€“ 16 August 2022) was a British writer. He was known for his dark fantasy series Spook's. Delaney was born in Preston, Lancashire. Delaney died on 16 August 2022 at the age of 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Penguin Books Author Page * Fantastic Fiction Author Page * Author interview with FantasyBookReview.co.uk Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:British novelists Category:Writers from Lancashire
